svg.text: Simple PTC GRAM: Hybrid Anomaly Detection Architecture

g.text: Top-3 models, statistical analysis, and actionable insights
Key Innovations in Simple PTC GRAM
• No end-to-end training - uses pre-trained encoder only
• Multiple anomaly scoring methods instead of single gradient-based approach
• Traditional ML classifiers for final decision instead of threshold-based detection
• Focus on PTC dataset with specialized data loading and feature engineering
